sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the Community
Self-Revitalization Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.  As used in this Section:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Section:

sections.heading: Funding sources.
sections.text:
Subject to appropriation, the Department may make grants to
communities
that are certified as economically distressed communities under this Act and
that create a Board of Economic
Advisors
under this Act for the operational expenses of the Board. The procedures for
grant
application shall be established by the Department
by rule.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
